name: Marina Forrest
title: Anatomy
details: Amazing design and the best of all. Honestly, these are the two main reasons I bought this theme. Great clean design and no page builders whatsoever. Thank you for making a non-page builder theme. Really appriciate it.

name: Jeffrey Wayne
title: Autometic
details: Great support. The support guys helped me on each and every step. I liked their support team and I highly recommend this theme. The theme is very easy to set up, functional and easy to customize. Really Great job they are doing .
